org.apache.flink.api.java.typeutils.runtime.record

Class RecordSerializer

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class RecordSerializer
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<org.apache.flink.types.Record>
    Implementation of the (de)serialization and copying logic for the Record.
